messages: Hi! I've been following you for a while now
Your content really speaks to me on a personal level
I feel like you understand what I'm going through
Sometimes I just need someone to talk to
Just subscribed - show me your best content
I'm looking for VIP treatment here
What exclusive stuff do you have that others don't get?
I want to be your #1 fan
You're the best creator on this platform
Can you do something special just for me?
I've been supporting you since day one
